atk-vin02a28:2_2: gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīreti gaggarānāmikāya itthiyā kāritapokkharaṇiyā tīre.
atk-vin02a28:2_4: Ussukkampi akāsi yāguyātiādīsu manussehi āgantukesu āgatesu ācikkheyyāthāti vuttaṭṭhāneyeva ussukkaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭati;
atk-vin02a28:2_6: Gaccha tvaṁ bhikkhūti satthā tassa bhikkhuno tattheva senāsanaṁ sappāyanti addasa,
atk-vin02a28:3_0: 382.Adhammena vaggakammaṁ karontītiādīnaṁ parato pāḷiyaṁyeva nānākaraṇaṁ āgamissati.
atk-vin02a28:4_0: 385.Aññatrāpi dhammā kammaṁ karontīti aññatrāpi dhammaṁ kammaṁ karonti,
atk-vin02a28:4_2: Bhūtena vatthunā kataṁ dhammena kataṁ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a28:4_5: aññatrāpi satthusāsanā kammanti etesupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a28:4_6: Ettha pana vinayoti codanā ca sāraṇā ca.
atk-vin02a28:4_10: yaṁ aññesu paṭikkosantesu kataṁ taṁ paṭikuṭṭhañceva hoti katañca;
atk-vin02a28:5_0: 387.Chayimāni bhikkhave kammāni adhammakammantiādīsu pana “dhammo”ti pāḷiyā adhivacanaṁ.
atk-vin02a28:5_1: Tasmā yaṁ yathāvuttāya pāḷiyā na kariyati,
atk-vin02a28:5_6: Yasmā pana ñattikamme ñattidutiyañatticatutthesu viya hāpanaṁ vā aññathā karaṇaṁ vā natthi,
atk-vin02a28:5_9: tesaṁ sabbesampi kammānaṁ vinicchayaṁ parato vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin02a28:7_1: Idāni yadidaṁ chaṭṭhaṁ dhammena samaggakammaṁ nāma,
atk-vin02a28:7_6: na kiñci kammaṁ kātuṁ nārahatīti attho.
atk-vin02a28:8_0: 389.Catuvaggakaraṇañce bhikkhave kammaṁ bhikkhunicatutthotiādi parisato kammavipattidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-vin02a28:8_3: Nānāsīmāya ṭhitacatutthoti sīmantarikāya vā bahisīmāya vā hatthapāse ṭhitenāpi saddhiṁ catuvaggo hutvāti attho.
atk-vin02a28:10_0: 394.Ekaccassa bhikkhave saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhatītiādi paṭikuṭṭhakatakammassa kuppākuppabhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-vin02a28:12_0: 395.Dvemā bhikkhave nissāraṇātiādi vatthuto kammānaṁ kuppākuppabhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-vin02a28:12_8: Yasmā panassa ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyyāti vuttaṁ,
atk-vin02a28:12_10: Tañce saṅgho nissāretīti sace saṅgho tajjanīyakammādivasena nissāreti,
atk-vin02a28:12_11: so yasmā tattha “tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhave bhikkhūnaṁ ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya –
atk-vin02a28:12_12: eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako,
atk-vin02a28:12_13: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno,
atk-vin02a28:12_14: eko gihisaṁsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikehi gihisaṁsaggehī”ti evaṁ ekekenapi aṅgena nissāraṇā anuññātā,
atk-vin02a28:13_1: Tattha tañce saṅgho osāretīti upasampadakammavasena paveseti.
atk-vin02a28:13_3: Sahassakkhattumpi upasampādito anupasampannova hoti ācariyupajjhāyā ca sātisārā,
atk-vin02a28:14_0: 397.Idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti daṭṭhabbātiādi abhūtavatthuvasena adhammakammaṁ,
atk-vin02a28:16_5: Dvimūlake yathā sativinayo amūḷhavinayena saddhiṁ ekā pucchā katā,
atk-vin02a28:16_7: Avasāne pana upasampadārahaṁ upasampādetīti ekameva padaṁ hoti.
atk-vin02a28:16_8: Parato bhikkhūnampi sativinayaṁ ādiṁ katvā ekekena saddhiṁ sesapadāni yojetabbāni.
atk-vin02a28:18_4: dhammapatirūpakenasamagga”nti imesaṁ vasena cakkaṁ bandhitvā tajjanīyādīsu sattasu kammesu paṭipassaddhīsu ca vipattidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-vin02a28:18_8: Tato paraṁ paṭikuṭṭhakatakammappabhedaṁ dassetuṁ sāyeva pāḷi “akataṁ kamma”ntiādīhi saṁsanditvā vuttā.
atk-vin02a28:18_9: Tattha na kiñci pāḷianusārena na sakkā vidituṁ,
